column4: Hi there, I need to create Ubuntu USB stick but I haven't any compatible OS at the moment (only NetBSD and OpenBSD), is it possible to just download an .img file and simply dd it (copy) to USB stick device ?
for 11.10 you can use 'dd' to image the iso file to the flash. no special tools needed
that only works with 11.10 - not the earlier ubuntu releases
